projects.title: Snapdeal
projects.bodyText:
- Description: A major Indian e-commerce platform offering a wide range of products, including electronics, fashion, home essentials, and more. 
 - Tech Focus: High scalability to handle large user traffic and complex logistics management.

projects.title: Invoice Ninja
projects.bodyText:
- Description: An open-source platform for freelancers and small businesses to manage invoicing, track payments, and streamline finances.
 - Tech Focus: Laravel backend with Vue.js frontend, designed for ease of customization and integration with third-party payment platforms.

projects.title: Kolo
projects.bodyText:
- Description: A platform for home builders, renovators, and designers to share ideas, find inspiration, and connect with professionals.
 - Tech Focus: Likely leveraging visual and content-heavy designs to attract and engage users.

projects.title: CRAFTS
projects.bodyText:
- Description: A marketplace focusing on handcrafted items and artisanal products, connecting local artists to buyers globally.
 - Tech Focus: Backend likely focused on catalog management and secure payments.

projects.title: The Sill
projects.bodyText:
- Description: An e-commerce platform specializing in houseplants, plant care accessories, and workshops to encourage plant care culture.
 - Tech Focus: Beautiful frontend design, efficient product categorization, and a user-friendly shopping experience.

projects.title: Hydrow
projects.bodyText:
- Description: A company offering high-tech rowing machines paired with an interactive virtual rowing experience for fitness enthusiasts.
 - Tech Focus: Seamlessly integrating hardware, real-time video streaming, and user performance tracking.

projects.title: PeepSo
projects.bodyText: - Description: A WordPress plugin for creating private social networks and community websites, with features like messaging, news feeds, and profiles. - Tech Focus: Built on PHP, highly customizable, and integrates with popular WordPress tools.

projects.title: Barchart
projects.bodyText: - Description: A financial data platform providing market data for stocks, commodities, cryptocurrencies, and more, catering to traders and investors. - Tech Focus: Real-time data updates, financial analytics, and a responsive user interface for in-depth analysis.
